subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Democrat demands White House student loan records

05/01/07 07:30 PM, EDT
The Democratic head of the U.S. House education committee said Tuesday investigators probing the Bush administration's management of federal student loan programs had found "serious oversight failures by senior officials."
